hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select order_id, xml from ( select x.order_id, x.xml from MNP_PORT_REQ_Q q left join MNP_PORT_REQ_XML x on x.order_id = q.order_id where q.status = 'Q' and q.mvno_name = :mvnoName and x.order_id is not null order by q.priority, q.order_date ) where rownum <= ( (select p.value from MVNO_SYSTEM_PARAM p where p.name = 'PORT_REQ_LIMIT' and p.mvno_name = :mvnoName) - (select p.value from MVNO_SYSTEM_PARAM p where p.name = 'PORT_REQ_CNT' and p.mvno_name = :mvnoName) )
